text: Br채uningshof is a district of Langensendelbach in the Upper Franconian district of Forchheim. It is between the cities of Erlangen and Forchheim. In this formerly rural town, most of the residents go to work in Erlangen today. The name of the village Br채uningshof was first mentioned with Bruningeshoven in 1158. It is traced back to the family name "Br채uning" or "Bruning", which at that time often occurred in Franconia. ==References== Category:Forchheim (district)
